AvatarFilter::StoredInput

AvatarFilter::StoredInput Struct Reference

Detailed Description

This is an internal structure used to encapsulate a single set of received input values for use by the AvatarFilter.

Currently the avatar filter ignores 'roll' and that is continued here.
